physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Decreased hair density on the vertex and frontal scalp; recession of the frontal hairline; increased testosterone level at 5.8 nmol/L; increased androstenedione level at 18.4 nmol/L; increased free testosterone index at 10.2; normal sex hormone binding globulin level at 56.8 nmol/L.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improved hair density compared with baseline clinical photographs after 6 months; continued improvement at 24 months; improvement in hirsutism with disappearance of hair on chest and back.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Increased facial and body hair; frontal recession with decreased hair density over the vertex and crown; overweight with a body mass index of 40; increased testosterone level at 3.7 nmol/L; increased androstenedione level at 13.3 nmol/L; increased dehydroepiandrosterone sulfate level at 13.4 nmol/L.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially treated with Dianette; hirsutism and hair loss improved but plateaued; addition of finasteride in 1999 showed noticeable improvement by 1 year, with continued improvement at 2.5 years.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Decreased hair density over the frontal scalp and crown; bitemporal recession; hirsutism with coarse hair on the face, arms, and legs; high testosterone level at 3.4 nmol/L; low sex hormone binding globulin level at 21.1 nmol/L; high free testosterone index at 16.1.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Moderate response to 2% minoxidil lotion at 1 year; stabilized scalp hair loss after 6 months on finasteride; small improvement in hair growth after 2 years.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Increased facial and body hair; frontal and temporal recession; overweight with a body mass index of 42; elevated testosterone at 3.5 nmol/L; increased androstenedione at 11.4 nmol/L; increased dehydroepiandrosterone sulfate at 10.4.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Stabilized hair loss after 9 months on finasteride; improvement in hirsutism after 9 months; improvement in hair growth compared to baseline after 2.5 years.
